translation.ja: 次はウィスコンシン州から ロイヤルトンダンス学校

translation.en: [man] Go Royalton!
[Burt] This morning's competition has been fierce...
-[Barb] So, jackets off, please. -[Buzz] Buddy. Let me help you out.
translation.ja: 上着を脱いで 手伝おう

translation.en: [Buzz] What happened?
Oh, my goodness. Honey...
Miss April told you two not to practice the Star Lift too much.
translation.ja: リフトは練習しすぎちゃ ダメでしょ？

translation.en: Dicky, bud. Why didn't you tell me?
translation.ja: なあ どうして黙ってた

translation.en: He was hiding it.
I was afraid you wouldn't let me dance.
translation.ja: 出るなって言われるから

translation.en: [sighs] So, what do we do? -Do we tell them we can't go on or-- -[Dicky] No.
I can do it.
I just have to think of something else they can do instead of the Star Lift.
[Burt] Next up, New Hope Dance Studio.
translation.ja: ニューホープ ダンス･スタジオです

translation.en: All right. Well, everybody take your places. Let's go.
Wait! No, strike a pose instead of the lift, okay?
translation.ja: 待って　ポーズに変更して

translation.en: Strike a pose instead of the lift!
translation.ja: スターリフトはダメよ

translation.en: They're gonna be great.
It's going well. It's going well.
-Yes! -[Buzz grunts]
[April] Dicky, no!
[April] Don't do the Star Lift, Dicky. Don't do it.
translation.ja: リフトはダメ やめて

translation.en: -[whispers] Do not... -Don't--
-[April] What are they doing? -[Barb] Don't know.
Don't!
-[Oona] New Hope rules! -[girl] New Hope!
translation.ja: すごいよ ニューホープ

translation.en: Oh, my God!
My daughter is a beast! [laughing]
[Burt] Coming up is New Hope with their contemporary routine, led by their teacher, April Dibrina.
translation.ja: 次はエイプリル率いる 指導者共演の部です

translation.en: Let's see if they can impress Broadway's Welly Wong.
translation.ja: ウェリー･ウォンの前で 踊ります

translation.en: [Nick] Ape? You in there?
Hey.
We are almost up. The girls are waiting,
translation.ja: 出番だよ バーブさんも緊張してる

translation.en: and Miss Barb looks like she's about to pass a kidney stone.
translation.ja: バーブさんも緊張してる

translation.en: Hey. You okay?
What if I blow it?
You're serious?
Wait. All those times in front of paying audiences, and you're nervous about this?
translation.ja: プロの舞台のほうが 緊張するだろ？

translation.en: Nick, I was just in the chorus. No one was ever looking at me.
translation.ja: コーラスガールなんて 誰も見てない

translation.en: And now, everyone is counting on me.
translation.ja: ここでは みんなに期待されてる

translation.en: The girls, my dad, the town,
translation.ja: 子供たち パパ 町の人

translation.en: and I can't let everyone down.
Hey, how could you possibly let anyone down?
translation.ja: どうやって期待を裏切る？

translation.en: April. What you've done for everyone? It's amazing.
translation.ja: 君は みんなに 最高のものを与えた

translation.en: You know when you told me that you came to New York after I sent you "The Text"?
translation.ja: 私のメールを受け取った後 ニューヨークに来たのよね

translation.en: Yeah.
I really wish I'd seen you that day.
translation.ja: その日 会えたらよかった

translation.en: [Burt] Next up, New Hope Teacher Feature.
translation.ja: ニューホープ 指導者共演の部です

translation.en: We are family.
We are family.
Always.
We are family.
Always.
-[Kari] Whoo! We made it! -We're in the final round!
[Dicky] We did it! We crushed it!
[Barb] They loved the Teacher Feature. We made it!
translation.ja: 指導者共演も最高だった

translation.en: -Just like I taught you. -Just like you taught me.
translation.ja: やったな やったわ

translation.en: You two slayed it!
-[kids] Yeah! -Yeah, you did! Oh, yeah, you did!
translation.ja: お前たち 最高だった

translation.en: April! I have to run back to take care of an emergency but...
translation.ja: エイプリル 私は急用で戻るんだが―

translation.en: can I steal you away for a moment? I have a proposition for you.
translation.ja: 君に話がある 仕事の話だ

translation.en: Yes, of course. Um...
I will catch up with you guys.
This couldn't have worked out more perfectly, right?
April? Hey.
I was just coming to find you, um--
Where are you going?
I'm, uh... I'm headed back to New York.
translation.ja: 私はニューヨークに帰る

translation.en: Welly Wong offered me a part in his new show. The lead.
translation.ja: ウェリー･ウォンに スカウトされた　主役よ

translation.en: And I have to be at rehearsals now.
translation.ja: すぐに練習が始まるの

translation.en: Welly's been called back.
Oh, what about finals?
They're tomorrow.
I'll tell him you'll be right out.
[whispers] Yeah. Thanks.
So, you're just ditching us?
But this whole thing was your idea. You made a commitment.
I know. But what am I supposed to do?
translation.ja: そうね でも どうしろと？

translation.en: Sarah, I've dreamt of this my whole life.
translation.ja: ずっと夢見てた舞台よ

translation.en: So, I'm going.
[scoffs] That was the plan the whole time, wasn't it?
You just wanted to use the stupid little girls so you could claw your way back to Broadway.
translation.ja: 夢のために 私たちを利用したの？

translation.en: I knew it. I knew it the whole time. You're just a selfish jerk!
translation.ja: やっぱり身勝手なクズだ

translation.en: [scoffs] Okay, you don't care about anyone but yourself! You're just leaving me again!
translation.ja: また自分の都合でいなくなる

translation.en: Good luck tomorrow.
April...
April, wait! April!
translation.ja: 待って エイプリル

translation.en: Wait! Wait!
Please.
Please don't go.
-Please. -You don't need me. You're gonna be great.
translation.ja: 私がいなくても踊れる

translation.en: -I promise. -[sobs] Please.
-I'm sorry. -No, please, don't--
[Nick] Hey! April!
April!
-Yay, Piggy! -Hey!
Sarah?
Everybody. Everybody, attention, please. Andrew, Michael, ladies.
translation.ja: みんな 注目して 紹介する　誰だと思う？

translation.en: Guess who this is?
translation.ja: 紹介する　誰だと思う？

translation.en: This is our Whirly Girl, April.
Let's all give her a warm welcome.
♪ It looks as if I stumbled Right into the palm of your hand ♪
Thanks.
You're welcome, baby girl.
Good night.
[April] Good night.
Hello?
[April] I'm doing the right thing, right?
Well, sweetheart, you've been busting your ass at this for quite a long time.
translation.ja: このために 長い間 努力してきたんだ

translation.en: I mean, I finally got my dream.
It's the perfect show.
The perfect role.
I don't know, I just--
I thought I'd be happier.
Yeah. That's the problem with being a perfectionist.
translation.ja: ああ お前は完璧主義だ

translation.en: Nothing's ever good enough.
You know, I keep telling myself.
I'm a dancer.
This is what I'm supposed to do.
Says who?
You do what your gut tells you to do.
And if there's any part of you that thinks that making a big splash on Broadway is suddenly gonna bring your mom back,
translation.ja: ブロードウェイで成功すれば ママが戻ると思ってるなら―

translation.en: you can forget about that.
There's nothing you can do to bring her back.
Because it wasn't your fault that she left in the first place.
She just left.
So, whatever you decide, just make sure that it makes you feel good about who you are.
translation.ja: なりたい自分になれる道を 選ぶんだ

translation.en: I mean... it's what I've always wanted to be.
translation.ja: ダンサーは私の夢だった

translation.en: I'd be stupid not to.
I didn't say "what you are," I said "who."
And I can think of nine little reasons why it wouldn't be so stupid.
translation.ja: どんな人になりたいか考えろ

translation.en: Hey, everybody. We'll start scene work in five minutes.
translation.ja: ５分後に合わせて練習しよう

translation.en: Top of the second act.
Mr. Wong.
Mr. Wong. I'm sorry, Mr. Wong, but I have to go back to the competition.
translation.ja: すみません 大会に戻ります

translation.en: If that means that you have to give my part to someone else,
translation.ja: 主役を降ろされても 構いません

translation.en: I understand. I mean, I don't want you to, because I think you need someone who honors their commitments.
translation.ja: でも思うんです 主役は約束を守るべきだと

translation.en: And you see, that's exactly why I have to go, because...
I have nine little kids that I committed to.
translation.ja: 子供たちと約束したの

translation.en: You know, I have a whole town that's counting on me.
translation.ja: みんなの期待に応えたい

translation.en: So, I have to go.
What the--
When do they go on?
They're in the first group after lunch,
-but I can't find them. -Okay, I'm on my way back.
translation.ja: 誰もいない すぐ戻る

translation.en: -You'll never make it in time! -Get them ready. I'll be there. Promise!
translation.ja: 間に合うはずない 必ず行く

translation.en: Ruby,
-find them. -On it.
translation.ja: ルビー　捜して 分かった

translation.en: You couldn't have asked to borrow his limo?
Just admit it. You love me.
-[Deco] You owe me gas money. -[April] To Atlantic City!
translation.ja: ガス代 払って アトランティックシティーへ

translation.en: [over PA] Hi, I'm Burt Davenport, and we continue on with day two of our competition!
translation.ja: さあ 大会２日目は 順調に進んでいます

translation.en: -Next up, number 44. -Oh, my gosh. Oh, my gosh. -[Burt] Large group production number. -Gosh.
translation.ja: 次は44番 グループダンスの部

translation.en: The New Hope Dance Studio.
translation.ja: ニューホープ ダンス･スタジオ！

translation.en: -Okay? -Okay?
-[April] Goodbye, yep! -Go! Run! You can make it! Go!
translation.ja: 急いで　まだ間に合う！

translation.en: -[Burt] This is the final countdown... -Excuse me, coming through. [Burt] ...for the New Hope Dance Studio.
translation.ja: 出場チームは 至急 集合してください 〝決勝戦〞

translation.en: Oh, my gosh! Oh, my gosh! Oh, my gosh!
translation.ja: どうしよう　まだかしら

translation.en: Oh, my God!
-We're at our countdown. -Okay.
Okay.
They should be-- Oh, no.
translation.ja: みんな ここに… いない

translation.en: -Where are they? -I don't know. I don't know. I was panicking. I said to Ruby, I was like, "Find them,"
translation.ja: どこかしら ルビーに 捜すよう頼んだけど―

translation.en: but I wasn't-- I didn't specifically say like, "Bring them stage left." I--
translation.ja: “舞台の左袖に”とは 言わなかった

translation.en: [Ruby] Everybody, get ready.
Hurry, we are in our final countdown.
What's she doing here?
Yeah, I wonder who's in the audience this time?
translation.ja: 今度は誰に見せるため？

translation.en: What happened to your amazing job?
translation.ja: 夢の舞台はどうしたの？

translation.en: Well, they probably fired her. Again.
translation.ja: またクビになったのかも

translation.en: Look, you have every right to hate me, but you earned this.
translation.ja: 私を嫌ってもいい でも みんなは 努力して ここまで来た

translation.en: You deserve to be here.
translation.ja: でも みんなは 努力して ここまで来た

translation.en: So, please don't sit out on this just because you wanna get back at me.
translation.ja: 私への仕返しのために 諦めないで

translation.en: When I first met you, all I saw were flaws.
translation.ja: 最初は下手だったけど―

translation.en: And then I realized, that's exactly what makes you spectacular.
translation.ja: だからこそ みんなは すばらしいの

translation.en: All those beautiful quirks and imperfections.
translation.ja: 完全じゃない美しさがある

translation.en: And I'm so sorry that I left.
translation.ja: 見捨てて ごめんなさい

translation.en: [April] It just-- It took me a second...
to realize that...
we've become family.
What's wrong with you?
How come you're not yelling at us?
I want you to know how proud I am of all of you.
translation.ja: みんなのこと 本当に誇らしく思う

translation.en: You've all become the most beautiful dancers.
translation.ja: すてきなダンサーに成長した

translation.en: You're scaring me.
-Michelle-- -[Burt] New Hope
...Dance Studio, last call. You have one minute to be on stage
translation.ja: 最後の呼び出しです あと１分で―

translation.en: or you will be disqualified.
Disgusted. I'm disgusted
translation.ja: 最低ね　吐き気がする

translation.en: by all this whimpering self-pity.
translation.ja: メソメソと弱音ばかり

translation.en: Now, this is not how I trained you.
So, put on your big-girl pants.
translation.ja: 女子の意地を見せて あなたもよ

translation.en: You too, Dicky. You get on that stage,
translation.ja: 女子の意地を見せて あなたもよ 舞台に出ないと許さない

translation.en: or else.
translation.ja: 舞台に出ないと許さない

translation.en: You have till the count of five. One.
Oh, you thought I was being tough on you before. Oh, no, I was just getting started.
translation.ja: もっと厳しくしてもいいのよ

translation.en: -Two! -Jackets. Okay.
Give me your jackets. Jackets!
translation.ja: 上着を脱いで　早く

translation.en: Yeah, that's what I thought. Three!
Come on, let's do it.
Clear for talent.
-Step aside. Fierceness is coming through. -[audience applauding]
translation.ja: どいて　強敵のお通りよ

translation.en: You better kick butt, or I'll kick yours!
translation.ja: 失敗したら承知しない

translation.en: You made it.
Work it, girl! Yeah!
[Burt] Wow! What a killer routine!
translation.ja: わお すばらしいダンスです

translation.en: I don't think he's out there, honey.
Gordy told me he took off when he heard you were back.
translation.ja: あなたを避けてるみたい

translation.en: [April] "Sorry to do this in a text."
-Hi, honey. -Barb.
You're so-- What did I tell you?
-You have to hold it away from your face. -Sorry. -I'm just gonna see every pore. -Okay, well--
translation.ja: もっと顔から離して 毛穴が丸見え

translation.en: Listen, I got some bad news. That barn's roof is leaking.
translation.ja: 悪い知らせよ 納屋が雨漏りしてるの

translation.en: I mean, so much worse than my studio.
translation.ja: スタジオより ひどい

translation.en: -Well, I asked Nick to repair it and-- -Whoa, hold on.
Okay, in my defense, I said we should replace, not repair.
translation.ja: 修理じゃない 屋根を新しくするんだ

translation.en: Well, anyway, we canceled class. Okay, bye.
translation.ja: とにかくレッスンは中止

translation.en: Hang on. Hang on. That's not the agreement.
I teach class over FaceTime. They do what I say.
translation.ja: オンラインで教える約束よ

translation.en: I fly back every Sunday. They do what I say.
translation.ja: 毎週 日曜には戻る

translation.en: -Okay. But-- -And what I say is,
translation.ja: でも… 雨漏りしようと構わない 泳いでもやって

translation.en: I don't really care if there's three feet of water and they have to swim.
translation.ja: 雨漏りしようと構わない 泳いでもやって

translation.en: They show up to class.
[Barb] I know. We gotta beat the Royaltons next year.
translation.ja: 来年は優勝を目指すのよね

translation.en: Well, I'll get them all together and call you when I have them.
translation.ja: みんなが集まったら また連絡する

translation.en: Okay.
-Bye. -[knocking]
Come in. Oh, Mr. Wong. Hi.
translation.ja: どうぞ ウォンさん

translation.en: I have some notes. A couple tweaks.
translation.ja: 気になる点はいくつかある

translation.en: But...
it didn't suck.
Thank you.
Oh, before I forget,
they said somebody's waiting for you in the theater.
What are you guys doing here?
Well, you asked me to get everyone together.
[stammers] How did you guys afford this?
[Welly] Discussion for later. I will call you next week.
Improve your listening skills. I said I'd call you next week.
translation.ja: 聞こえたか？　来週だ

translation.en: So, what are we gonna do now?
[April] We're having an opening night dance party.
♪ Dance, dance, dance, dance, dance... ♪
[April] You guys ready?
[Buzz] Dicky!
[April] Goodnight, New York!
